overview: “Franciscan Blessing” features the beloved “Father Max,” a tireless peacemaker who represented the ecumenical work of the Vatican for over 40 years. Mizzi, who passed away in 2008, lives on in this timeless feast of breathtaking images of Mother Nature.  After his opening blessing, you are invited to use this 'media alchemy' as an inspiration to feel your own connection to the Divine.
tagline: A timeless feast of breathtaking images of Mother Nature
title: Franciscan Blessing: Receiving Grace
